summary: Adds a spell in the dark brotherhood sanctuary for anyone with the Assassins blade perk
descriptionHtml:
[center]Once again video kind of says it all

VERSION 2.0, adds invisibility at the end and also teleports player back to where they started from
Firestorm is still real though cause.. REASONS!
Source included
[youtube]CipAaX8HUR0[/youtube]
Got lazy on the video lol


[youtube]pVqf20m1y7o[/youtube]

--Probably gonna tweak the animations a bit more in Discworld--


Also, Discworld trailer as usual, this spell will actually be Teatime's in our mod
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]
[/center]

Description
Adds a spell in the dark brotherhood sanctuary
The spell has a 3 second charge time
The spell will only work on ActortypeNPC's
The spell will only work if you are sneaking
The spell will only work if you have a dagger in your main hand
The spell will only work if you have the assassins blade perk
You can be in combat and cast it though it does have a 3 second charge time
This will NOT kill essential or invulnerable

The spell pops you behind the target you hit and wtf pwns them, then you explode with a firestorm
Giggidy
author: darren83
